subject: RefWorks Trial Subscription
body:
Dear RefWorks User, 

We hope you are taking advantage of your 30-day free trial to RefWorks and finding out how valuable a tool RefWorks is.

Within the next few days, you will receive an email from us with information on how to convert your trial subscription to an individual subscription.  The annual fee is $100 USD which includes all upgrades and free technical support.

If your organization subscribes to RefWorks, you are entitled to a free RefWorks account as part of their subscription. Please contact us at the support address above if you believe you should be registered as part of an organization-wide subscription so we can assist you in moving your account.

If you would like to purchase RefWorks now, go to www.refworks.com/content/path_learn/purchase.asp and fill out the appropriate information. We will contact you for payment details.   

Your trial will expire in 15 days.  You will receive one additional notice providing you with an opportunity to subscribe before your database is automatically deleted.

If you have any questions or comments about RefWorks, please do not hesitate to contact us at support@refworks.com.


Thank you for your interest in RefWorks, 
RefWorks Support
